mainText:
Steve & Apple, Inc.,
Thank you for all the wonderful years of innovation. For re-inventing Apple at a time when we needed a visionary. You were truly awe-inspiring and unique. In a word...genius.
Also, thank you for the Apple stock, it was the one happy surprise that I got to keep from my violent and dreary divorce.

God Bless you! devoted Apple fan since 1983, stockholder since 1992.
author: Brian
